parameters: Researcher Dokusa: I'm praying for your safety!
Clea: What kind of place is this?

Sophia the priestess: This is the land where the first Magic
Academy existed. It is the place where the supreme god, Sol,
passed judgment on the arrogant magicians.

Priestess Sophia: I have heard that this entire area was
destroyed by the wrath of Sol and has become a land where
strange creatures wander.

Mage Relm: That's a very priest-like explanation! But I
don't believe in the judgment of the gods.

Mage Relm: However, I believe without a doubt that it has
become a desert due to some powerful magic.

Researcher Dokusa: That's right! This is a special space for
magicians!

Researcher Dokusa: What happened here... unraveling that is
also my mission!
Mage Relm: They really appear everywhere, don't they...
Clea: Thank you for helping us defeat the dragon.

Researcher Dokusa: Aren't we quite the team! And being able
to investigate the dragon's remains is incredibly
fulfilling.

Researcher Dokusa: So, what I want you all to do is to
subdue the dangerous creatures that have been found within
the desert.
Clea: Understood. Is there anything we should be careful of?

Researcher Dokusa: There are creatures that can freely move
within the sand. If they try to escape, please chase after
them and make sure to defeat them completely.

Mage Relm: I was supposed to be in the Mucos region...
why... is this the aftermath of judgment... how did I end up
here...

Bard: This is the final ingredient for your dream. How you
use it is up to you.

Bard: The creation of the grimoire can only be done in the
deepest part of the aftermath of judgment.

Bard: In other words... this is the location where the old
Magic Academy used to be.

Mage Relm: W-Why are you telling me all of this! Please make
it clear whether you're here to help or hinder!

Bard: I think you'll eventually [do it], so I just think
it's better to do it sooner.

Mage Relm: I will never give up on my dreams, absolutely
never give up!
